main event: Two men reported simultaneously hearing a roar and observing two circular objects reflecting light, traveling at great speed, over Salmon Dam, Idaho on 13 August 1947.
interesting points: The objects were at a great height estimated between 4,000 to 6,000 feet., The witnesses had doubts the objects were ordinary aircraft., The incident occurred on the same day as another sighting (#75) but had differing descriptions., The objects were several miles away, making size determination difficult., The sighting included a sound described as resembling the echo of a motor.
witness description: two male civilians who reported hearing a roar
